channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump grants sweeping pardon of Jan. 6 defendants, including rioters who violently attacked police
item.description: President Donald Trump has pardoned, commuted the prison sentences or vowed to dismiss the cases of all of the 1,500-plus people charged with crimes in the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S.

item.title: Beneath a veneer of calm, Trump’s inauguration holds warning signs for US democracy
Trump wants to pull the US out of the World Health Organization again. Here’s what may happen next
